metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3605 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: There's a flaw in OpenEXR's rleUncompress functionality in versions prior to 3.0.5. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to an application linked with OpenEXR could cause an out-of-bounds read. The greatest risk from this flaw is to application availability.

criterions.comment: openexr package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
